contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Greek Dimos |name = Oinofyta |name_local = Οινόφυτα |image_map = Dimos Oinofyton.png |map_caption = Location within the regional unit | periph = [[Central Greece (region)|Central Greece]] | periphunit = [[Boeotia]] |municipality = [[Tanagra]] |pop_municunit = 8195 |population_as_of = 2001 |population_ref = [http://www.statistics.gr/gr_tables/S1101_SAP_1_TB_DC_01_03_Y.pdf source] |area_municunit = 77.27 |elevation = 61 |lat_deg = 38 |lat_min = 18 |lat_hem = N |lon_deg = 23 |lon_min = 38 |lon_hem = E |postal_code = 320 11 |area_code = 22620 |licence = ΒΙ |mayor = |website = |image_skyline = |caption_skyline = |city_flag = |city_seal = |districts = |party = |since = |elevation_min = |elevation_max = }} '''Oinofyta''' ([[Greek language|Greek]]: Οινόφυτα) is a village and former municipality in eastern [[Boeotia]], [[Greece]]. Following the local government reform of 2011 it is now part of the municipality of [[Tanagra]], of which it is a municipal unit.<ref name=Kallikratis>[http://www.kedke.gr/uploads2010/FEKB129211082010_kallikratis.pdf Kallikratis law] Greece Ministry of Interior {{el icon}}</ref> ==Subdivisions== The municipal unit of Oinofyta is subdivided into the following communities (constituent villages in brackets): *[[Agios Thomas, Boeotia|Agios Thomas]] *Kleidi *Oinofyta (Oinofyta, Dilesi) ==Historical population== {| class=wikitable ! Year !! Town population !! Municipality population |- | 1981 || 2,555 || - |- | 1991 || 3,697 || - |- | 2001 || 3,137 || 8,195 |} ==Pollution== In December 2007, official tests revealed that drinking water in Oinofyta was contaminated with high levels of the carcinogen [[hexavalent chromium]], which is used as an anti-corrosive in the production of stainless steel, paint, ink, plastics and dyes. For decades, factories had been dumping waste in the [[Asopus|Asopos River]], whose waters run from red to black and ripple with bubbling sludge.<ref name=enn>[http://www.enn.com/ecosystems/article/26533 River runs purple and contaminates Greek town]</ref> ==See also== *[[List of settlements in Boeotia]] ==References== <references /> ==External links== *[http://www.oinofyta.gr Municipality of Oinofyta] *[http://www.agiosthomas.eu Local Department of Agios Thomas] {{Tanagra div}} [[Category:Populated places in Boeotia]] {{CGreece-geo-stub}}
